languages.text: "Нелепый вопрос, под стать твоему недалекому роду. Гемункулы — художники страдания и мастера плоти, исследователи неизведанных истоков боли, величайшие в своей расе. В моей голове — гениальный разум, в моих руках — власть над жизнью и смертью, мое тело — венец хирургической науки. Наши умы хранят знания сотен поколений".

traits.locale_text: {n}Одна из бровей Тервантьяса едва заметно изгибается, явно изображая недоумение.{/n} "Нелепый вопрос, под стать твоему недалекому роду, мон-кай. Гемункулы друкари — художники алхимии и мастера плоти, одни из величайших отроков своего народа. В моей голове – гениальный разум, в моих руках — власть над жизнью и смертью, мое тело – венец хирургической науки".
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: "An absurd question befitting your small-minded kind. The Haemonculi are artists of anguish and the masters of flesh. The delvers into unexplored sources of pain. The greatest among their people. My head holds a brilliant intellect, my hands command power over life and death, my body is the pinnacle of surgical discipline. Our minds hold the knowledge of hundreds of generations."
languages.original_text: "Нелепый вопрос, под стать твоему недалекому роду. Гемункулы — художники страдания и мастера плоти, исследователи неизведанных истоков боли, величайшие в своей расе. В моей голове — гениальный разум, в моих руках — власть над жизнью и смертью, мое тело — венец хирургической науки. Наши умы хранят знания сотен поколений".

The greatest among their people. My head holds a brilliant intellect, my hands command power over life and death, my body is the pinnacle of surgical discipline. Our minds hold the knowledge of hundreds of generations."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: « Voilà une question absurde, propre à l'intelligence limitée de votre espèce. Les hémoncules sont des artistes, maîtres de la manipulation de la chair et de la souffrance. Des explorateurs à la recherche de nouvelles sources de douleur. Les membres les plus illustres de leur peuple. Je possède un intellect hors norme et mes mains sont capables d'insuffler la vie comme la mort. Mon corps représente l'apogée de la discipline chirurgicale. Nos esprits abritent la sagesse des centaines de générations qui nous ont précédés. »
languages.original_text: "An absurd question befitting your small-minded kind. The Haemonculi are artists of anguish and the masters of flesh. The delvers into unexplored sources of pain. The greatest among their people. My head holds a brilliant intellect, my hands command power over life and death, my body is the pinnacle of surgical discipline. Our minds hold the knowledge of hundreds of generations."

traits.locale_text: « Voilà une question absurde, propre à l'intelligence limitée de votre espèce. Les hémoncules sont des artistes, maîtres de la manipulation de la chair et de la souffrance. Des explorateurs à la recherche de nouvelles sources de douleur. Les membres les plus illustres de leur peuple. Je possède un intellect hors norme et mes mains sont capables d'insuffler la vie comme la mort. Mon corps représente l'apogée de la discipline chirurgicale. Nos esprits abritent la sagesse des centaines de générations qui nous ont précédés. »
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: “何等荒谬的问题，与你这种愚蠢的种族确实很相称。血伶人是痛苦的艺术家，也是血肉的大师。我们是探索者，负责探索所有尚未开发的痛苦源泉，我们是黑暗灵族之中最伟大的人。我的头脑蕴含着丰富的智慧，我的双手拥有操纵生死的力量，我的身体是外科手术铸就的巅峰。我们血伶人的头脑中，蕴藏着几百代人的知识。”
languages.original_text: "An absurd question befitting your small-minded kind. The Haemonculi are artists of anguish and the masters of flesh. The delvers into unexplored sources of pain. The greatest among their people. My head holds a brilliant intellect, my hands command power over life and death, my body is the pinnacle of surgical discipline. Our minds hold the knowledge of hundreds of generations."

traits.locale_text: “何等荒谬的问题，与你这种愚蠢的种族确实很相称。血伶人是痛苦的艺术家，也是血肉的大师。我们是探索者，负责探索所有尚未开发的痛苦源泉，我们是黑暗灵族之中最伟大的人。我的头脑蕴含着丰富的智慧，我的双手拥有操纵生死的力量，我的身体是外科手术铸就的巅峰。我们血伶人的头脑中，蕴藏着几百代人的知识。”
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: "Eine absurde Frage, wie sie zu Eurer kleingeistigen Spezies passt. Die Haemonculi sind Künstler der Pein und die Meister des Fleischs. Die Erkunder unbekannter Schmerzquellen. Die größten unter ihresgleichen. Mein Kopf beherbergt einen genialen Intellekt, meine Hände bestimmen über Leben und Tod, mein Körper ist der Höhepunkt chirurgischer Disziplin. Unser Verstand enthält das Wissen von hunderten von Generationen."
languages.original_text: "An absurd question befitting your small-minded kind. The Haemonculi are artists of anguish and the masters of flesh. The delvers into unexplored sources of pain. The greatest among their people. My head holds a brilliant intellect, my hands command power over life and death, my body is the pinnacle of surgical discipline. Our minds hold the knowledge of hundreds of generations."

traits.locale_text: "Eine absurde Frage, wie sie zu Eurer kleingeistigen Spezies passt. Die Haemonculi sind Künstler der Pein und die Meister des Fleischs. Die Erkunder unbekannter Schmerzquellen. Die größten unter ihresgleichen. Mein Kopf beherbergt einen genialen Intellekt, meine Hände bestimmen über Leben und Tod, mein Körper ist der Höhepunkt chirurgischer Disziplin. Unser Verstand enthält das Wissen von hunderten von Generationen."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: «Una pregunta absurda acorde a tu limitada inteligencia. Los Hemónculos son artistas del sufrimiento y maestros de la carne. Buscan fuentes de dolor inexploradas. Son los mejores entre su estirpe. Mi cabeza alberga un brillante intelecto, mis manos deciden entre la vida y la muerte, mi cuerpo es el pináculo de la disciplina quirúrgica. Nuestras mentes encierran el saber de cientos de generaciones».
languages.original_text: "An absurd question befitting your small-minded kind. The Haemonculi are artists of anguish and the masters of flesh. The delvers into unexplored sources of pain. The greatest among their people. My head holds a brilliant intellect, my hands command power over life and death, my body is the pinnacle of surgical discipline. Our minds hold the knowledge of hundreds of generations."

traits.locale_text: «Una pregunta absurda acorde a tu limitada inteligencia. Los Hemónculos son artistas del sufrimiento y maestros de la carne. Buscan fuentes de dolor inexploradas. Son los mejores entre su estirpe. Mi cabeza alberga un brillante intelecto, mis manos deciden entre la vida y la muerte, mi cuerpo es el pináculo de la disciplina quirúrgica. Nuestras mentes encierran el saber de cientos de generaciones».
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: 「お前のような小心者にふさわしいバカげた質問だ。ハモンキュラスは苦悶の熟練者であり、<屍肉の主>である。未知の痛みの源を徹底的に追及する者、彼らの中で最も偉大な者だ。私の頭には聡明な知性があり、私の手には生と死を司る力があり、私の身体は精密に統制が取れている。我々の頭には何百世代もの知識が詰まっているのだ」
languages.original_text: "An absurd question befitting your small-minded kind. The Haemonculi are artists of anguish and the masters of flesh. The delvers into unexplored sources of pain. The greatest among their people. My head holds a brilliant intellect, my hands command power over life and death, my body is the pinnacle of surgical discipline. Our minds hold the knowledge of hundreds of generations."

traits.locale_text: 「お前のような小心者にふさわしいバカげた質問だ。ハモンキュラスは苦悶の熟練者であり、<屍肉の主>である。未知の痛みの源を徹底的に追及する者、彼らの中で最も偉大な者だ。私の頭には聡明な知性があり、私の手には生と死を司る力があり、私の身体は精密に統制が取れている。我々の頭には何百世代もの知識が詰まっているのだ」
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: "Kısıtlı zihne sahip türüne yakışan absürtlükte bir soru. Haimonkuluslar, ızdırap sanatçıları ve et üstatlarıdır. Keşfedilmemiş acı kaynaklarını keşfe çıkarlar. Halkının en yüceleridirler. Başımda muazzam bir zekâ, ellerimde yaşamı ve ölümü komuta etme gücü, bedenimde en üst seviyede cerrahi disiplin bulunur. Zihinlerimiz yüzlerce neslin sahip olduğu bilgiyi ihtiva eder."
languages.original_text: "An absurd question befitting your small-minded kind. The Haemonculi are artists of anguish and the masters of flesh. The delvers into unexplored sources of pain. The greatest among their people. My head holds a brilliant intellect, my hands command power over life and death, my body is the pinnacle of surgical discipline. Our minds hold the knowledge of hundreds of generations."

traits.locale_text: "Kısıtlı zihne sahip türüne yakışan absürt bir soru. Haimonkuluslar ızdırap sanatçıları ve et üstatlarıdır. Keşfedilmemiş acı kaynaklarını keşfe çıkarlar. Halkının en yüce kişileridirler. Başımda muazzam bir zekâ, ellerimde yaşam ve ölüme komuta etme gücü, bedenimde en üst seviyede cerrahi disiplin bulunur. Zihinlerimiz yüzlerce neslin sahip olduğu bilgiyi ihtiva eder."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae
